meta-review.comment: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged is a wild ride that doesn't reinvent the wheel, but it definitely adds more nitro to the arcade racing experience. With added depth to the racing and new vehicle classes, burning plastic on orange tracks has never been more fun. Although the challenges and rewards could use a turbo boost, the multiplayer overhaul and expanded events offer a thrilling and frenetic racing game that keeps the pedal to the metal. It's not a drastic change from the original, but for fans of toy-based racing, this sequel takes the checkered flag.
